mapper.select: select u.id as userId, u.username, u.avatar, u.sex, u.signature, u.region, u.email, u.phone, date(u.create_time) as registerTime, date(fr.create_time) as createFriendTime from xg_user u left join xg_friend_relation fr on fr.user_id = #{userId} and fr.friend_id = #{friendId} and fr.del_flag = 0 where u.del_flag = 0 and u.id = #{friendId}
